function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased physical activity in public spaces may lead to greater risk of contagious disease transmission","Impact":"Potential increase in contagious disease transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures in public spaces, promote the use of face masks, and provide public education on hygiene practices","Technologies":"Public health messaging, contact tracing apps, and crowd monitoring technology","People":"General public, especially in urban areas","Owner":"Government health departments and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Informal settlements and urban poor may not have access to safe physical activity options at home","Impact":"Limited ability for the urban poor to engage in safe physical activity, leading to potential health disparities","Mitigation":"Develop safe public spaces for physical activity, provide resources for indoor exercise, and implement community-based physical activity programs","Technologies":"Community health apps, virtual exercise classes, and urban planning software","People":"Urban poor in informal settlements","Owner":"Local government, community organizations, and non-profit groups"},{"Description":"Lack of guidelines on safe physical activity outdoors during a pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to lack of guidance on safe outdoor activities","Mitigation":"Develop and distribute guidelines for safe outdoor physical activity, promote individual risk assessment, and provide access to accurate health information","Technologies":"Health and safety apps, location-based risk assessment tools, and crowd density monitoring systems","People":"General public engaging in outdoor physical activity","Owner":"Public health organizations, government health departments, and fitness industry"}]}
